about_the_game:
Forlorn remnants, doomed to linger. Residual echoes wail in dark places.⠀⠀
Lurking dead resent the living. ⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ Seething Things.⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ No one else can help.
Your team will brave forgotten sites and unearth past sins to cleanse innocent spirits and banish wicked souls unto final retribution. Beware: good or evil, they want you out.

Tread Carefully

Keep your Fear level under control, they can sense it. Careless investigation will anger the spirit. You only have three nights to cast it out; enrage it and you will be forced to flee and lose the rest of your night. Employ ghost hunting equipment ranging from occult contrivances to technology that skirts implausibility to locate the evidence you need to complete your goal.

You're Not Alone

Up to four players can join an investigation and progress one of several distinct classes with unique skill trees.
  • The ardent Priest repels aggressive spirits and is adept at performing exorcisms.
  • The impetuous Reporter will uncover the truth at any cost and can transmit evidence for outside analysis.
  • The insightful Medium can pierce the veil to evaluate evidence and sense the spirit's temperament.
  • The stoic Monk is unshaken by troubled souls and swiftly lays them to rest.
  • The wary Technician isn't having any of this ghost nonsense. They're happy to assist their team from the safety of the lab. (This class is for your friends who would prefer a less terrifying experience)

They Were Once Human

Ghosts have different personalities and motivations.
Help purify the innocent; send the corrupt to hell. Each one has a story.
  • A tragic accident has left them lost and confused.
  • A sadistic murderer, looking for one last kill.
  • An innocent victim that will try to help you so they can move on.
  • They all have one thing in common: They're in pain, and they're furious.

content_descriptors.notes: Contains frightening depictions of ghosts and occasional jumpscares

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 / AMD Radeon R9 390
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-10600 / AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060 / AMD Radeon RX 5700
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Seething Things is a horror investigation game where up to four players choose from unique exorcist classes and attempt to expel vengeful ghosts. Carefully gather evidence without angering them and banish them to the hereafter!
